name: HMCameraStreamState
desc: The states associated with a camera stream.

items.name: case notStreaming
items.desc: The state when the camera stream is not active.

items.name: case starting
items.desc: The state when the camera stream start request is processing.

items.name: case stopping
items.desc: The state when the camera stream is stopping.

items.name: case streaming
items.desc: The state when the camera stream is currently in progress.
